title: Highland Hollow
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Leland Hazard
provenance_text:
Estate of John Kane; Valentine Gallery, New York, NY, 1936 (likely as agent of the John Kane estate, Carnegie exhibition, 1936; (M. Knoedler and Co., New York, NY, 1948); Mr. [1893-1980] and Mrs. [1900-1983] Leland Hazard, Pittsburgh, PA, 1954 [1]; gift to Museum, 1960.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Leland Hazard was born Mary Chorn. The Hazards retained life interest in the painting (p. 51 of Arkus' catalogue for 1966-1967 exhibition "Hicks Kane Pippin".)

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
